recipe.title: Chocolate-Mint Shamrock Shake
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups mint chocolate chip ice cream
instructions: In a blender, combine the mint chocolate chip ice cream with the milk and process until smooth, about 30 seconds. Add the chocolate chips and stir to combine. Pour the shake into a glass, top with the whipped cream, and drizzle with chocolate syrup.
